English:
What the heck did you think you were doing?!
You... jerk! You stupid jerkface!
Chinese:
真是的，你到底在做什麼啦！？
你這個……笨蛋……笨蛋笨蛋！
Korean:
정말, 뭐하는 거야!?
이… 바보… 바보바보!
German:
Was zum Teufel hast du denn da gemacht?!
Du ... Trottel! Du blöder Volltrottel!

English:
Listen, you! There's only so much crazy stuff
we're gonna let you get away with!
Chinese:
你這傢伙！就算要亂來，
也該有點限度吧！
Korean:
너 말이야…! 터무니없는 짓을 저지르는 것도
한도라는 게 있잖아…!
German:
Hör mal zu! Irgendwann ist auch mal wieder gut
mit den verrückten Aktionen!

English:
What were the rest of us supposed to do if you
didn't make it back?
Chinese:
要是回不來的話，
你打算怎麼辦！？
German:
Was hätten wir denn machen sollen, wenn du nicht
wiedergekommen wärst?

English: But all's well that ends well. I'm still glad.
Chinese: 不過，沒事就好……真的是太好了。
German: Aber Ende gut, alles gut. Ich bin froh.

English:
What the deal with that?
I guess that's just like him, though.
Chinese:
什麼嘛……
不過，很像他呢。
German:
Wieso das denn?
Aber sieht ihm ganz ähnlich.

English:
Whoa... Whoa!
It's King Drasil's will!
Chinese:
哦哦……哦哦！
世界樹的意志……
German:
Oh ... Oh!
Es ist der Wille König Drasils!

English:
King Drasil's normal functions have resumed,
and seem to be restoring the Digital World.
Chinese:
世界樹取回了功能，再次啟動了。
它好像是要讓數碼世界恢復原狀。
Korean:
위그드라실이 기능을 되찾아서, 재기동하고 있다
디지털 월드를 복구할 모양이군
German:
König Drasil hat seine Funktion wieder aufgenommen
und scheint die Digitale Welt zu regenerieren.

English: Whoa, hey... Shouldn't we be leaving then?
Chinese: 喂喂……待在這裡不太妙吧？
Korean: 야야… 여기에 있으면 위험한 거 아니야?
German: He ... Sollten wir dann nicht verschwinden?

English: Yes, we had better get out of here.
Chinese: 好、好像出去外面會比較好呢……
Korean: 바, 밖으로 나가는 편이 좋을 것 같네요…

English:
Okay! Let's move!
Are you okay, [p]?
German:
Gut! Gehen wir!
Alles in Ordnung, [p]?

English:
He complained that he didn't want to go home.
Kept saying things that made no sense...
But he seemed quite satisfied.
Chinese:
他吵著不想回去。
他淨是說些讓人聽不懂的話。
不過，他看起來好像很滿足。
Korean:
돌아가기 싫다고 떼를 썼어
의미불명인 말만 잔뜩 했어
…하지만, 무척 만족스러워 보였어
German:
Er meinte, er will nicht mehr nach Hause.
Er hat lauter wirres Zeug geredet ...
Er schien ziemlich zufrieden.
